unnormalised: The Ministry of Education shifted its HQ to a brand new building near AIIMS, Delhi. The old address, Shashtri Bhavan, Dr. Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi-110001, became quite congested, apparently. This new location, though not officially announced with a big fanfare, is supposedly at Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi, Pin Code 110016.
normalised: The Ministry of Education shifted its H-Q to a brand new building near A-I-I-M-S, Delhi. The old address, Shashtri Bhavan, Doctor Rajendra Prasad Road, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and one, became quite congested, apparently. This new location, though not officially announced with a big fanfare, is supposedly at Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi, Pin Code one hundred and ten thousand and sixteen.

unnormalised: So, if you're sending important documents, especially regarding scholarships or something, prepone your dispatch, bhai! The old address might still work for a while, but better to be safe than sorry. Especially if you are sending your applications via speed post.
normalised: So, if you're sending important documents, especially regarding scholarships or something, prepone your dispatch, bhai! The old address might still work for a while, but better to be safe than sorry. Especially if you are sending your applications via speed post.

unnormalised: Heard from a friend who works there that the full address is something like, "Ministry of Education, New Building, Near AIIMS, Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi-110016." Sounds like a mouthful, no? I hope they make it clearer on their website soon.
normalised: Heard from a friend who works there that the full address is something like, "Ministry of Education, New Building, Near A-I-I-M-S, Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and sixteen." Sounds like a mouthful, no? I hope they make it clearer on their website soon.

unnormalised: Also, keep in mind that different departments might still be at different locations. For example, the regional offices for CBSE and NCTE probably have their own separate addresses, right? Better double-check before sending anything urgent to avoid any unnecessary delays.
normalised: Also, keep in mind that different departments might still be at different locations. For example, the regional offices for C-B-S-E and N-C-T-E probably have their own separate addresses, right? Better double-check before sending anything urgent to avoid any unnecessary delays.

unnormalised: Anyway, this move is supposed to improve efficiency and make things easier for everyone involved, from students to educators. Let's hope that's actually the case! Don't forget to update your address books, folks!
normalised: Anyway, this move is supposed to improve efficiency and make things easier for everyone involved, from students to educators. Let's hope that's actually the case! Don't forget to update your address books, folks!
